sentence: What prerequisites for 545 are hardware courses ?
sql: SELECT COURSEalias0.DEPARTMENT , COURSEalias0.NAME , COURSEalias0.NUMBER FROM COURSE AS COURSEalias0 INNER JOIN COURSE_PREREQUISITE AS COURSE_PREREQUISITEalias0 ON COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSE_PREREQUISITEalias0.PRE_COURSE_ID INNER JOIN COURSE AS COURSEalias1 ON COURSEalias1.COURSE_ID = COURSE_PREREQUISITEalias0.COURSE_ID WHERE COURSEalias1.DEPARTMENT LIKE "EECS" AND COURSEalias1.NUMBER = 545 ;
